title: Fight Like A Girl
description: ï»¿Sometimes you just have to fight like a girl!This is a story about a girl and her struggle to free herself from an abusive step-father. Will enough ever be enough for her... or will her step- father kill her before she breaks free. Finally at witts end and nowhere else to turn Lilly tries enlists the help of a unique and unlikely person who may just hold the key to her freedom in his hands.
author: Kasey O'Grady
